penaltyPolicy.firstA: Creators who do not provide required shipping information after being selected as reviewers will be subject to a 6-month suspension from all Lococo activities after three occurrences.

penaltyPolicy.fistA: Creators who do not provide required shipping information after being selected as reviewers will be subject to a 6-month suspension from all Lococo activities after three occurrences.
penaltyPolicy.fistQ: Failure to provide shipping information when selected as a reviewer.
penaltyPolicy.secondA: Creators who submit content past the specified deadline will face a 6-month suspension from all Lococo activities after three occurrences.
penaltyPolicy.thirdA: Creators who fail to submit content or submit content that does not meet the specified quality standards will face a permanent ban from all Lococo activities.
penaltyPolicy.thirdQ: Failure to submit content or submitting low-quality content.
penaltyPolicy.title: Penalty Policy

changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.description2: We will notify you of significant changes by email or a notice on our website and update the “Last Updated” date above.
changesToThisPrivacyPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy

childrensPrivacy.description: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13.
childrensPrivacy.description2: We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13.
childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy

contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy:
contactUs.title: Contact Us

dataDeletion.description: If you have connected your social media accounts (such as Instagram, TikTok, or Facebook) to Lococo and wish to delete your data, you may request data deletion at any time. To do so, please contact us at support@lococo.beauty with the subject line "Data Deletion Request", and we will permanently remove your account and all associated data from our systems within 30 days. You may also disconnect your connected social media accounts directly from your Lococo account dashboard. Once disconnected, no further data will be collected from those accounts. Lococo complies with Meta’s Platform Terms and Data Deletion Requirements by providing users with a clear and accessible way to request data deletion through both email and in-app account settings.
dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion

dataRetention.description: We retain Personal Data only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this Policy, to meet legal obligations, or to resolve disputes.
dataRetention.description2: Usage Data is typically stored for shorter periods unless required for security or improvement purposes.
dataRetention.title: Data Retention

dataTransfers.description: Your data may be processed outside your country, including where privacy laws differ.
dataTransfers.description2: We ensure all transfers meet adequate protection standards under this Policy.
dataTransfers.title: Data Transfers

descriptions.title: If you register or log in via a Third-Party Social Media Service (e.g., Google, Instagram), we may collect information linked to your account such as your name, email, and contacts. You may choose to share additional information at your discretion.
When using our Service, we may ask for personal information, including:

description.dateTime: Date/time of visit, time spent, and diagnostic data
description.deviceDetails: Device details and mobile identifiers when accessed through mobile
description.ipAddress: IP address, browser type/version, and pages visited

descriptions.businessTransactions: Business Transactions: Data may be transferred in a merger or acquisition.
descriptions.legalRequirements: Legal Requirements: We may disclose data to comply with law, protect rights, or prevent wrongdoing.

externalLinks.description: Our Service may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for their content or privacy practices and recommend reviewing their Privacy Policies.
externalLinks.title: External Links

howWeUseYourData.description: We may use your Personal Data to:

descriptions.conductAnalyticsAndImproveService: Conduct analytics and improve our Service
descriptions.contactYou: Contact you regarding updates or security notices
descriptions.providePromotionalOffers: Send promotional offers (unless you opt out)

descriptions.inBusinessTransfers: In Business Transfers – As part of corporate transactions.
descriptions.publicly: Publicly – When you share information in public areas or via connected social media.
descriptions.withAffiliatesOrBusinessPartners: With Affiliates or Business Partners – Under the same privacy standards.
descriptions.withConsent: With Consent – For any other purpose you approve.
descriptions.withServiceProviders: With Service Providers – For analytics, customer support, or communications.

howWeUseYourData.title: How We Use Your Data

Account.description: A unique account created for you to access our Service.
Account.title: Account

Affiliate.description: Any entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with us (ownership of 50% or more of voting interests).
Affiliate.title: Affiliate

Cookies.description: Small files placed on your device that store browsing information.
Cookies.title: Cookies

Device.description: Any device that can access the Service, such as a computer, mobile phone, or tablet.
Device.title: Device

PersonalData.description: Any information that identifies or can identify an individual.
PersonalData.title: Personal Data

ServiceProvider.description: Any person or company processing data on our behalf.
ServiceProvider.title: Service Provider

ThirdPartySocialMediaService.description: Platforms such as Google, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or LinkedIn through which you can register or log in.
ThirdPartySocialMediaService.title: Third-Party Social Media Service

UsageData.description: Automatically collected data related to how you use our Service (e.g., IP address, browser type, time spent).
UsageData.title: Usage Data

You.description: The individual or entity accessing or using the Service.
You.title: You

interpretation.description: Words with capitalized initial letters have meanings defined below. These definitions apply whether in singular or plural form.
interpretation.title: Interpretation and Definitions

lastUpdated.description:
Lococo (“we”, “us”, or “our”) operates the website https://www.lococo.beauty/ (the “Service”).This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your information, your privacy rights, and how the law protects you.
By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Policy.
lastUpdated.title: Last Updated: August 31, 2025

securityOfData.description: We take commercially reasonable steps to safeguard your Personal Data.
securityOfData.description2: However, no online transmission or storage system is completely secure.
securityOfData.title: Security of Data

typesOfCookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies (beacons, tags, scripts) to improve and analyze our Service.
typesOfCookies.description2: You can refuse cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not function properly.

essentialCookies.description: Enable basic functions and prevent fraud.
essentialCookies.title: Essential Cookies (Session)

functionalityCookies.description: Remember preferences like language or login.
functionalityCookies.title: Functionality Cookies (Persistent)

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies

yourRights.description2: Please note we may retain certain data as required by law.

descriptions.access: Access, update, or delete your Personal Data via your account settings

yourRights.title: Your Rights

acceptanceOfTerms.description: By accessing or using Lococo (the “Service”), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (“Terms”). If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you may not access or use the Service.
acceptanceOfTerms.title: Acceptance of Terms

descriptions.accountDeletion: Users may delete their accounts at any time.
descriptions.dataRetention: After account deletion, Lococo will retain user data for 90 days to process any outstanding matters. After this period, all associated data will be permanently deleted.

contactUs.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
contactUs.title: Contact Us

descriptions.accountCreation: Each individual may create and maintain only one account.
descriptions.serviceAvailability: The Service is available only to individuals who are 13 years of age or older.
descriptions.warranty: By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you meet these requirements.

governingLaw.description: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Korea. Any disputes arising under or related to these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Korea.
governingLaw.title: Governing Law

descriptions.content: All content, trademarks, logos, and materials available on Lococo are owned by Lococo or its licensors.
descriptions.ownership: Users retain ownership of any content they create and share but grant Lococo a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to display and operate the content within the Service.

limitationOfLiability.description: Lococo is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we disclaim all liability for any damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the Service.
limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability

descriptions.advertisements: We do not display advertisements within the Service.
descriptions.collection: We collect personal information from users, including: name and username, phone number, email address, mailing address, and age.
descriptions.email: We do not send promotional emails or newsletters.
descriptions.privacyPolicy: For details about how we handle personal information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

prohibitedActivities.description: Users agree not to engage in the following activities:
prohibitedActivities.description2: Violation of these rules may result in suspension or termination of your account without prior notice.

descriptions.disruption: Any action that may disrupt, damage, or interfere with the proper functioning of the Service.
descriptions.fraudulentActivities: Fraudulent activities or attempts to deceive other users or the platform.
descriptions.illegalContent: Uploading or sharing illegal, harmful, or inappropriate content.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
